about_the_game:
This soundtrack to the smash rhythm-music hit BIT.TRIP RUNNER features turbo-charged chiptune-inspired tracks that will get you matching your stride to The Good Commander himself. Bookended by chipmusic rock band Anamanaguchi, the BIT.TRIP RUNNER soundtrack adds a thrilling new beat to CommanderVideo's jammy as he takes the world by storm. Continue your own BIT.TRIP with this essential audio companion.

BIT.TRIP RUNNER Original Soundtrack+

  • Blackout City (feat. Anamanaguchi)
  • Impetus
  • Strength
  • Tenacity
  • Conviction
  • Triumph
  • Fortitude
  • Mermaid (feat. Anamanaguchi)
  • Inspiration
  • Bravery
  • Anticipation
  • Admiration
  • Support
  • Demo The Second (Steam Exclusive)
